metadata.title: CVE-2023-45024 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Best Practical Request Tracker (RT) 5 before 5.0.5 allows InformationDisclosure via a transaction search in the transaction query builder.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-45024` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

request-tracker5 - 5.0.5+dfsg-2
rt5-apache2 - 5.0.5+dfsg-2
rt5-clients - 5.0.5+dfsg-2
rt5-db-mysql - 5.0.5+dfsg-2
rt5-db-postgresql - 5.0.5+dfsg-2
rt5-db-sqlite - 5.0.5+dfsg-2
rt5-fcgi - 5.0.5+dfsg-2
rt5-standalone - 5.0.5+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: request-tracker5 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.0.5+dfsg-2').
